component.name: ArdorQuery
component.description: ArdorQuery is a UI tool for performing any HTTP(S) endpoints like REST API, HTML, Images, GraphQL, OData etc. Similar to cURL and Postman. The main goal is to make an application with minimal user interface and keyboard oriented.

description.p: Fixed crash on scroll in Query Editor.
Fixed select focused field after restore from help.
Fixed selected item in global variables list after reopen popup.
Added new shortcut Ctrl-9 in query editor. You can select from list predefined global variable and insert it to current line after position of cursor.
